column4: so i just did a apt-get upgrade and it set my resolution back down to 800x600... Why does this happen all the time?
i shouldnt have to backup before doing a sudo apt-get upgrade but I mean I understand backing it up if you are going to edit it in any way but apt should back it up automatically
this is obviously not from today...  xorg.conf.dist-upgrade-200811091020
you're right... whether you back up or not first is up to you
